segments.text: I'm looking at these two kids, and I can't help but smile a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so dedicated to their secret cookie mission!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stretch, the girl's eager anticipationâ€”it's just classic childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it's barely holding on, which adds to the thrill, I suppose.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's amazing how determined kids can be when sweets are involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is totally oblivious, lost in her own world of dish-drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've timed this perfectly, or perhaps she's just incredibly focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they'll get away with it, or if they'll be caught red-handed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a certain joy in watching such innocent, yet slightly rebellious, acts.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open cookie jar is practically begging for a raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I bet those cookies taste extra delicious when they're forbidden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a delightful little subplot to the main kitchen drama.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are truly masters of stealth, or perhaps just lucky.
segments.speaker: PAR
